subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Weather
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The 19th stage of the Giro d’Italia was canceled because of snow along the route, and Saturday’s penultimate stage was altered for the same reasons.
snippet: The 19th stage of the Giro d’Italia was canceled because of snow along the route, and Saturday’s penultimate stage was altered for the same reasons.
